name: axi10
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))

comment: Axiom of Quantifier Substitution (intuitionistic logic axiom ax-10). This is just ~ axc11n by another name. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 31-Dec-2017.) (New usage is discouraged.)
